text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/conceptmap-properties defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
relationshipRefinement Relationship RefinementProperty of type coding that indicates a specific refined relationship such as categorized by or grouped

name: ConceptMapProperties
title: FHIR Defined ConceptMap Properties
description: A set of common concept properties for use on ConceptMap

concept.definition: Property of type coding that indicates a specific refined relationship such as categorized by or grouped
